contest-event.event-date:
May 20, 1905 D Chester-le-Street Contest (Second Section)
Chester-le-Street Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Chester-le-Street Contest chester-le-street-contest-second-section
None
Haddon Hall
Chester-le-Street, County Durham International contest between England and Scotland. 4 bands from the Scottish Amateur BBA competed against 4 bands from the Durham and Northumberland BBA. 8 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2012, 3:29 p.m. Sept. 6, 2018, 9:30 a.m.
1 Lochgelly Band James Carmichael
2 Birtley League of the Cross J. Moulding
3 Jarrow Borough Edwin R. Pritchard
4 Musselburgh & Fisherrow Trades Thomas Moore
Unknown Result Chester-le-Street John Hughes
Unknown Result Methil Town J. Ord Hume
Unknown Result Shotts Foundry John Radcliffe
Unknown Result Wingate Colliery J. G. Hughes
